title: Identify Slow-Moving Inventory
description: An inventory analyst needs to run a report to identify products that have not sold in the last 180 days.

tasks.description: Generate the 'Inventory Aging' or 'Slow-Mover' report for all products.
Filter the report to show only items with no sales in the past 180 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly filters the data to isolate the target products.

tasks.description: Create a summary of the slow-moving products and their total value, and send it to the category manager for disposition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends an actionable report to the appropriate stakeholder.
